summary: Replaces the default textures for wood walls and flooring on farmhouses and village houses (most houses and wood structures outside major cities) with higher quality ones.
descriptionHtml:
==Alternate Farmhouse Wood==

This mod replaces two default textures for wood walls and wood flooring for any house classified as a \"Farmhouse\". This includes village houses, inns, lumber mills, mine houses, stables, small camp houses, and of course, farm houses. In it\'s place, you can have either a clean finished texture, or a rugged and worn texture.

Feel free to comment, rate, endorse, criticize, suggest, or otherwise talk, about this mod. However, this is both my first texture, and my first mod, so go easy on me.

==Installation==

Choose your preferred look, and download that file. Unzip the file, and place the \"Textures\" folder into you \"Data\" folder (wherever Skyrim is installed). Upon startup and under the \"Data Files\" window, select \"Load Loose Files\".

To uninstall, search for the files you copied, listed below, and remove them.

==Replaces==

woodwall01.dds
woodwalkway01.dds

==Known Issues/Coming Later==

The spaces between wood planks do not always line up with the jagged edges of broken wood walls and wood flooring. Fixing this would require some re-alignment of the planks, which I might do later.

Certain shading elements were passed up when changing textures.

Still not quite happy with the rugged wall texture.

==Updates==

12/6/11 - 1.0: Farmhouse walls and floors
12/6/11 - 1.0a: Rugged version added.
12/9/11 - 1.1: Clean and Rugged version sharpened and resized to 2048x2048

==Credit==

ftIsis-Stock: http://ftisis-stock.deviantart.com/ - for the basic wood template
The Internet
author: Dalsio
